title: 5 Common Mistakes in Family Law Cases and How to Avoid Them
description: Family law matters often carry significant emotional weight, making it easy to fall into common pitfalls that can complicate your case. Understanding these mistakes—and learning how to steer clear of them—can make a substantial difference in the outcome of family law proceedings, including divorce and child custody battles.
